tasks.label: Launch backend
tasks.command: cd backend && poetry run python3 main.py

tasks.label: Launch worker
tasks.command: cd backend && poetry run python3 worker.py

tasks.label: Execute tests
tasks.command: cd backend && poetry run pytest -vv -c pytest.ini

tasks.label: Setup testing environment
tasks.command: export $(cat .env | grep DB_ROOT_PASSWD | xargs) && docker exec -i mariadb mariadb -u root -p$DB_ROOT_PASSWD < backend/romm_test/setup.sql
